name: Sieidi
description:
In the beginning Rádienáhkká and Rádienáhttje created the heavens, the earth and the underworld.

As the child of these gods you have been tasked to shape the earth into a Sieidi (sacred land).

Create your land by placing nature tiles on a map, and combine them to have the best score!

Game made for the 2021 Arctic Game Jam.
